amendment.description: To state the sense of Congress on funding of ongoing overseas military operations, including overseas contingency operations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1281 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 81 - 15. Record Vote Number: 286.

action.text: Amendment SA 1281 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S9536-9545; text: CR S9541) To state the sense of Congress on funding of ongoing overseas military operations, including overseas contingency operations.
